Operation.displayName: Management Agent: CAPS Payroll - Run Profile: Full Import
Process CAPS Payroll AVP File

PSChanges.PSScript: & "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Forefront Identity Manager\2010\Synchronization Service\MaData\CAPS\ExtractCAPSEntitlements.exe" "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Forefront Identity Manager\2010\Synchronization Service\MaData\CAPS Payroll\import.txt" "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Forefront Identity Manager\2010\Synchronization Service\MaData\CAPS\AVPInput.xml"

Operation.displayName: Generate LDIF from CAPS Payroll AVP XML

PSChanges.PSScript:
Import-Module "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Forefront Identity Manager\2010\Synchronization Service\Extensions\Common\TransformXmlToFile.ps1"; [string]$InputPath = "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Forefront Identity Manager\2010\Synchronization Service\MaData\CAPS\" [string]$OutputPath = "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Forefront Identity Manager\2010\Synchronization Service\MaData\CAPS\" [string]$XmlInputFile = "AVPInput.xml" [string]$LdifOutputFile = "capsData.ldif" [string]$XslFile = "XmlToLDIF.CAPS.xslt"
$debug = $False $now = Get-Date if($debug -eq $True) {Write-Host "*** Step #1 starting: " $now " ***"} Del "$OutputPath$LdifOutputFile" if($debug -eq $True) {Write-Progress -Activity "Transforming XML" -Status "Transforming XML (template mode) => ./$LdifOutputFile"} SaveTransformedXML "$InputPath$XmlInputFile" ` -IsTemplate $False -XSLPath "$OutputPath$XslFile" ` -XMLOutputPath "$OutputPath$LdifOutputFile" $now = Get-Date if($debug -eq $True) {Write-Host "*** All steps finished: " $now " ***"}

Operation.displayName: Management Agent: CAPS - Run Profile: FIFS

OperationList.Comment: Import CAPS replica updates (unscheduled FULL imports x2 + FULL sync only!)

OperationList.name: Clear Run History for FIM Agent

Operation.displayName: Clear Run History
Archive IIS Log Files

PSChanges.Script: [string]$logRoot = "C:\inetpub\logs\LogFiles\" [string[]]$logDirectories = @("W3svc1","W3svc2","W3svc3") [int]$dayDiff = 30 foreach($logDirectory in $logDirectories) { $logDirectoryPath = [System.IO.Path]::Combine($logRoot,$logDirectory) Write-Output ("Deleting log files in $logDirectoryPath older than: " + (Get-Date).toString('MM/dd/yyyy')) dir $logDirectoryPath | where { $_.creationtime -lt (get-date).adddays(-$dayDiff) -and $_.Extension -eq ".log" } | remove-item }

OperationList.Comment: Regularly clears and archives the run history for the FIM Agent agent.

$debug = $False $now = Get-Date if($debug -eq $True) {Write-Host "*** Step #1 starting: " $now " ***"} Del "$OutputPath$LdifOutputFile" if($debug -eq $True) {Write-Progress -Activity "Transforming XML" -Status "Transforming XML (template mode) => ./$LdifOutputFile"} SaveTransformedXML "$InputPath$XmlInputFile" ` -IsTemplate $False -XSLPath "$OutputPath$XslFile" ` -XMLOutputPath "$OutputPath$LdifOutputFile" $now = Get-Date if($debug -eq $True) {Write-Host "*** All steps finished: " $now " ***"}

PSChanges.Script: [string]$logRoot = "C:\inetpub\logs\LogFiles\" [string[]]$logDirectories = @("W3svc1","W3svc2","W3svc3") [int]$dayDiff = 30 foreach($logDirectory in $logDirectories) { $logDirectoryPath = [System.IO.Path]::Combine($logRoot,$logDirectory) Write-Output ("Deleting log files in $logDirectoryPath older than: " + (Get-Date).toString('MM/dd/yyyy')) dir $logDirectoryPath | where { $_.creationtime -lt (get-date).adddays(-$dayDiff) -and $_.Extension -eq ".log" } | remove-item }

OperationList.Comment: Delete IIS logs > 30 days

OperationList.name: AAA Delete Old SQL Backups

Operation.displayName: Delete SQL backups older than 5 days

PSChanges.Script: # Delete SQL backups older than 5 days [int]$daysToAge = 5 [string]$path = "E:\MSSQL13.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\Backup" Get-ChildItem Path $path -Filter "*.bak" Recurse | Where-Object { $_.CreationTime lt (Get-Date).AddDays(-$daysToAge) } | Remove-Item

OperationList.Comment: Delete SQL backups older than 5 days
